#
# This file was generated by Python QGIS Plugin for WLTS.
#

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
from wlts import WLTS

# Change to the WLTS URL you want to use.
service = WLTS('{service_host}')

# Example of trajectory operation
tj = service.tj(
    latitude={latitude},
    longitude={longitude},
    collections='{collections}',
    start_date='{start_date}',
    end_date='{end_date}'
)

print(tj.trajectory)

fig = WLTS.plot(
    tj.df(),
    marker_size=8,
    font_size=12
)

fig.show()
